item.title: The Structural Collapse of Indian Online Education Post-2021
item.description: why EdTech platforms' unit economics deteriorated faster than revenue growth, grounded in artificial pandemic demand, organizational misalignment, and market structural dynamics.

item.title: Cloud Cost Gravity, Structural Tension Between Velocity and Profitability
item.description: why cloud infrastructure costs accelerate faster than revenue growth, grounded in unit economics, operational mechanisms, and empirical data from industry research.

item.title: The Chicken-and-Egg Problem
item.description: cold-start dynamics in two-sided platforms, grounded in NBER research, field experiments, and S-1 data.
